description.value: When you terrorize your enemies, you also cause them painful mental distress. When you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Demoralize]{Demoralize} a foe, that foe takes [[/r {1d4}[mental]]]{1d4 mental damage} at the start of each of its turns as long as it remains @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened} and continues to engage in combat with you. If you have master proficiency in Intimidation, the damage increases to [[/r {2d4}[mental]]]{2d4}, and if you have legendary proficiency, the damage increases to [[/r {3d4}[mental]]]{3d4}.
